jobs.description: Helped design, build and improve Kindle Instant Previews, a shareable and embeddable e-book previewer. I was mainly responsible for mobile support and embeddability.
As lead developer of Infinitarium, I’ve worked on numerous websites, web apps and mobile games, along with highly skilled individuals of all specialties.
Designed and implemented a large-scale Wordpress portal, as well as various custom plugins tailored to the client’s particular needs.
Created an HTML5 game programming library. Blink’s modular API and extensive feature set gave my team a critical advantage in time-constrained game jams.
Helped architect and develop a dental clinic’s web-based CRM. The app crunches large volumes of medical data into helpful charts that assist the CEO in the decision-making process.
Taught a game programming course on Java for mobile devices (J2ME), and co-founded a local chapter of the USM Games organization.
Designed and coded personal portfolios, educational websites, online catalogs, etc. I worked with individuals and companies alike, both local and foreign.
Interned at an automotive parts retailer. This was my first glimpse of the pivotal role of computer software in the operation of a business.

pageDescription: Web developer Julio Sepia's resume, which shows his experience in web application development, responsive web design and game development.
title: Julio Sepia
subtitle: Web Developer
bio: I'm Julio, a software developer with experience in web applications (desktop/mobile), graphic design and videogames. I'm constantly amazed by the ever-improving capabilities of the web and I enjoy being an early adopter of new technologies. As a front-end specialist, I like to work closely with UX designers and product managers to define and deliver satisfying user experiences.

schools.name: Lycee Alliance Francaise de Saint Exupery
